pages.text: $(9)Crit Chance$() is the chance that an attack (or arrow) becomes a critical strike, compounding with jump crits. Values over 100% allow you to perform multicrits.$(p)Found on weapons.

$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 1$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 5$(p)Note: A value of 1.0 is actually 0% crit chance, but if the base was zero, percentage modifiers would have no effect, and flat modifiers don't convey the bonus correctly.
